C

com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test - package com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test
The classes that implement the unit tests for rules.
com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test - package com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test
The classes that implement the unit tests for SeleniumJUnit4ClassRunner.

S

ScreenShotOnFailureITCase - Class in com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test
Integration test cases for the ScreenShotOnFailure rule.
ScreenShotOnFailureITCase() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test.ScreenShotOnFailureITCase
 
screenShotRule - Variable in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test.ScreenShotOnFailureITCase
This run dumps screen shots to the target/screenshots directory when the test case fails.

Unit tests for the ServerConfiguration configuration style.

T

testHomePage() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.ServerITCase
Verify that we can navigate to the Google home page.
testHomePage() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.WebDriverITCase
Verify that we can navigate to the Google home page.
testHomePage() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.WrappedDriverITCase
Verify that we can navigate to the Google home page.
testInjection() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.ServerITCase
Verify that the test runner injected the Selenium Server.
testInjection() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.WebDriverITCase
Verify that the test runner injected the web driver.
testInjection() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner.test.WrappedDriverITCase
Verify that the test runner injected the Selenium Server that wraps the web driver.
testRule() - Method in class com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.rule.test.ScreenShotOnFailureITCase
This test case always fails triggering the ScreenShotOnFailureITCase.screenShotRule rule which will take a screen shot and write it to the target/screenshots directory.
